Package cz.cuni.mff.json4j

Class JSONToken

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.json4j.JSONToken
class JSONToken extends Object
Implementation of a lexical token for the purposes of the JSONParser. Holds the token's type and also its value. That makes sense only for values, so for other token types there are sensible defaults chosen. Not public, since there is no reason to use it outside parser implementation.

    • type

      public final TOKEN_TYPE type
      Type of the token. Used to determine the type of the value it holds.

    • value

      public final Object value
      Value the token holds. Needs to be casted to the proper type when used. Use this.type to determine it.

  • Constructor Details

    • JSONToken

      private JSONToken(TOKEN_TYPE type, Object value)
      Creates a token with specified fields. Used only in generateEOFToken() and therefore private.
      Parameters:
      type - TOKEN_TYPE of the token.
      value - value of the token.

    • JSONToken

      public JSONToken(String token_string)
      Creates an appropriate token based on the provided value. Thanks to the nature of the JSON grammar, the token type can be determined solely (except for EOF) based on the textual value (no context required).
      Parameters:
      token_string - the string read from a JSON that should be transformed into a token.

  • Method Details

    • generateEOFToken

      public static JSONToken generateEOFToken()
      Creates an EOF token. There is no sensible way of recognizing an EOF token based on its value and all moments when an EOF token should be emitted are explicitly known, creating a function to produce an EOF token is the most elegant solution.
      Returns:
      A token with type TOKEN_TYPE.EOF and value = null.
